attributes.action: Change scan Procedures for brain haemorrhage survivors
attributes.additional_details: People that have haemorrhage's abroad whilst on holiday don't get chance to have scans once back in the UK also most hospitals discharge you after the second scan if everything seems "normal" but there are risks of a second or third haemorrhage
attributes.background: Let brain haemorrhage survivors get scanned on a regular basis

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the NHS.
